sources.subtitle_1: How is your hydration goal calculated?
sources.text_1: We use the information you provideâ€”such as gender, weight, and activity levelâ€”to create a personalized hydration target, tailored specifically to your needs.
sources.subtitle_2: Does alcohol really affect my hydration?
sources.text_2:
Yes, it does. Our app estimates how much water (or any hydrating beverage) you need to drink to counterbalance the dehydration caused by alcohol. 

The hydration percentage on your home screen reflects this. 

Learn more here:
sources.link_2_3: Alcohol's Effect on Urination and Hydration
sources.subtitle_3: How accurate is the BAC (Blood Alcohol Content) calculation?
sources.text_3:
Our BAC estimates are based on the data you provide. 
While individual results may vary, we give you a general estimate of when youâ€™ll be sober. 

NEVER DRINK AND DRIVE! 

Learn more here:
sources.text_4: If you have additional questions, check out our FAQ here:
sources.text_4_2: You can also reach out to us directly at drinkydailydrinktracker@gmail.com. We're happy to help!
